<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Add LDAP Integration Settings</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/api/v33.00/settings/ldap"}></MethodEndpoint>



```
x-prisma-cloud-target-env: {"permission":"authConfiguration"}
```



Configures the LDAP integration.

For more information, see [Active Directory](https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/prisma/prisma-cloud/30/prisma-cloud-compute-edition-admin/authentication/active_directory) and [OpenLDAP](https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/prisma/prisma-cloud/30/prisma-cloud-compute-edition-admin/authentication/openldap)

## cURL Request

Refer to the following example cURL command that enables the LDAP integration and specifies the parameters required to integrate with an Active Directory service.

```bash
$ curl -k \
  -u <USER> \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -X POST \
  -d \
'{
   "enabled": true,
   "url": "ldap://ldapserver.example.com:3268",
   "searchBase": "dc=example,dc=com",
   "accountUpn": "example_service@example.com",
   "accountPassword": {
     "plain": "pass!-W0RD"
   },
   "type": "activedirectory",
   "userSearchIdentifier": "userprincipalname"   
}' \
  "https://<CONSOLE>/api/v<VERSION>/settings/ldap"
```


## Request

<MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>accountPassword</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

Secret Stores the plain and encrypted version of a value. The plain version is not stored in a database

</div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"encrypted"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Specifies an encrypted value of the secret.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"plain"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Specifies the plain text value of the secret.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"accountUpn"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"AccountUpn is the user principle name used to connect to the active directory server.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"caCert"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"CaCert is cert in PEM format (optional, if not specified, skip_verify flag will be used).\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"enabled"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Enabled indicates whether LDAP is enabled.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"groupSearchBase"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"GroupSearchBase is the LDAP search pattern for groups.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"searchBase"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"SearchBase is the LDAP search pattern.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"type"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Type specifies the LDAP server type (AD or OpenLDAP).\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"url"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"URL is the ldap server url.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"userSearchBase"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"UserSearchBase is the LDAP search pattern for users.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"userSearchIdentifier"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"UserSearchIdentifier is the user identifier to use for querying open ldap (e.g., cn -> cn=user).\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

OK
